name: V Racketeers
description:
Disclaimer: THIS IS A VERY EARLY ALPHA VERSION expect a very unstable and unpolished experience of the game

Everyone was a beginner once. 

In this upcoming game you can grow from a street player to a racquet sports professional. Unlike in reality, you can always take a step back to the past and enjoy those good old times again.

It is up to you if you want to become a professional squash player or rather explore more racquet games.

You can also explore the environment since there are some side activities like recycling or spray-painting

Join our discord or support us over at ko-fi or patreon and unlock benefits like behind the scenes of development or early access to new game versions
